title: Private sector led multi-stakeholder platforms positively influence certified common bean seed supply in Malawi
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Wanangwa Gondwe, Alexander Phiri, Eliud Birachi, Ruth Magreta, Catherine Larochelle, Kennedy Machira, Mercy Mutua, Jean Claude Rubyogo, Wilson Nkhata
